description: Talk to the Wanderer.

description: Your character will automatically avoid the traps if you click the mini-map to navigate through the pyramid.

5.step: Jump the pit (20% minimum energy required, 2 free hands help).

description: 20% energy is required to jump the pit and 2 free hands increase your chances of succeeding.

6.step: Go west and open the door.

description: Go west and open the door.

7.step: Click on the large golden bird to reset the puzzle until it lands on the solution shown.

description: Click on the large golden bird to reset the puzzle until it lands on the solution shown. Click the squares in numerical order according to the picture below to solve the puzzle.

description: Drop your cat and talk to the Sphinx.
Talk to the High Priest.

10.step: Open the door to the pyramid.

description: Open the door to the pyramid.
Jump the pit.

12.step: Open the western door and pick-up a canopic jar (you can only pick-up one of them).

description: Open the western door.
Try picking-up all the canopic jar until one allows you too.

13.step: Defeat the level 75 or 81 enemy and take the jar.

description: Defeat the level 75 or 81 enemy and take the jar.

14.step: Attempt to jump over the pit to wake up.

description: Attempt to jump over the pit to wake up.
Jump over the pit again.
Solve the western door puzzle.

17.step: Drop the jar where you found it.

description: Drop the jar where you found it.

18.step: Exit the pyramid via the entrance ladder.

description: Exit the pyramid via the entrance ladder.
Talk to the High Priest.
Talk to the Embalmer.

21.step: Talk to Raetul to get linen for 30 coins.

description: Talk to Raetul to get linen. Skip this step if you already have linen.

22.step: Talk to the Embalmer and give him the linen, salt, and sap.

description: Talk to the Carpenter once more to get the holy symbol.

description: Open the door to the pyramid.
Jump the pit.
Enter the east door
